text: Trent University is a public liberal arts university in Peterborough, Ontario. It also has a campus in Oshawa. Trent uses an Oxbridge college system and small class sizes."Help choosing a university in Ontario". The Globe and Mail, 22 October 2013 Erin Millar and Tari Ajadi ==References== Category:1964 establishments in Canada Category:Colleges and universities in Ontario
title: Trent University
